enhanced_by.reason: The classNames() method provides the set of class names that are used in the hasClass method to check for the presence of a specific class.
The attributes() method is used to access the class attribute, which is necessary for the hasClass method to perform its check.
The addClass method modifies the class attribute, which is directly related to the hasClass method's functionality of checking for the presence of a class.
The removeClass method also modifies the class attribute, which is directly related to the hasClass method's functionality.
